alert.note: Alert for Hampden; Hampshire; Middlesex; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:39PM EDT until August 26 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL WORCESTER...EASTERN HAMPSHIRE...SOUTH CENTRAL MIDDLESEX AND NORTHEASTERN HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 238 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Brookfield, or 17 miles west of Worcester, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Framingham, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Hudson, Westborough, Grafton, Sudbury, Holden, Ashland, Auburn, Hopkinton, Northborough, Clinton, Holliston, Millbury, Palmer, Spencer, Leicester and Maynard. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
